overview.en: Base Protocol (BASE) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Base Protocol has a current supply of 3,036,476.9806485 with 2,081,791.72869551 in circulation. The last known price of Base Protocol is 1.5240217 USD and is down -11.92 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 6 active market(s) with $113,882.45 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://www.baseprotocol.org/.
